TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
There's no release today.

Source? If you mean Max's tweet, in Squad time, it isn't "today" anymore, it's "tomorrow".

There's no release today.

You want a roit?

Never post something like this without a source^^
I think tonight, is the night, of nights.

You want a roit?

Never post something like this without a source^^

I Still Hold out hope .. .. Today.. Tomorrow .. Next week ...

I'll still be despretly clinging to my ticket on the hyper train.

Please oh mighty Devs :mad:Tame that wicked bug, bend it to thy bidding

and Release this update ... :blush:pritty please

There's no release today.

there might not be, but there's been no official word about it, if you're reffering to Max's tweet that was yesterday

Wow i was almost late for departure...

*Hopping on the hypetrain now, to infinity and beyond!!

Wow i was almost late for departure...

*Hopping on the hypetrain now, to infinity and beyond!!

There's still time! The hypetrain doesn't leave until the first SteamDB builds go up today!

So its my birthday today hope you can give me a nice present

ditto. I already have some cool gifts today, but this would make the day perfect.

*hurry and sit in the Hypetrain near a window*

OK, I'm ready for another day!

*hurry and sit in the Hypetrain near a window*

OK, I'm ready for another day!

With the speed this HYPEtrain travels its impossible to look outside the window. The past, present and future will happen all at once.
one ticket please

With the speed this HYPEtrain travels its impossible to look outside the window. The past, present and future will happen all at once.

Well, it's possible, but all you'll see is redshifting and blueshifting!

The hype train is going too fast. I think if it doesn't come out today it will crash and burn..... oh who am I kidding FULL HYPER SPEED AHEAD

Edited July 17, 2014 by 95tiger59
to --> too
Maybe I should stop looking at the Hype train going by and actually hop on. Is there still room for a newcomer? c:
Welcome aboard!

Maybe I should stop looking at the Hype train going by and actually hop on. Is there still room for a newcomer? c:

always seats on the hype train! just stay away from those of us who are foaming at the mouth. they have hyperactive hype disorder and may explode if the update doesn't come out soon

*buyin a ticket for the hype train*

*grabs coffee and sits*

oh god and it starts again today

this is the community that converted me from lurker to poster. i love you guys.
Hey, we might need a MAGLEV hypetrain tomorrow. We burned through all the HypeCoal, DannyOil and GlitchGrease yesterday.

ditto. I already have some cool gifts today, but this would make the day perfect.

then happy bday for u too

ditto. I already have some cool gifts today, but this would make the day perfect.

Happy bday!
I will sit on the hypetrain while I wait for the update. If SOE gets fixed before the release I'll play some Planetside.
Now boarding: The Hype Train, headed for Eventual Lock, with stops along the way at Baseless Speculation, Unbridled Anticipation, and Vague Information.
I can see the light at the end of the tunnel

I can see the light at the end of the tunnel

That's just an illusion from the relativistic speed of the hypetrain.

Now boarding: The Hype Train, headed for Eventual Lock, with stops along the way at Baseless Speculation, Unbridled Anticipation, and Vague Information.

Ahaha. This is all true. Have some rep.
